loan.name: Tafaauro
loan.use: to purchase vegetable seeds, chemicals, a wheelbarrow, a water tank, a rake, a shovel, hand gloves, and safety boots.
loan.description:
Tafaauro, a 30-year-old mother of five, runs a small vegetable business in her community, selling items like cabbage, eggplant, and cucumbers to make a living. She has been engaged in this venture for over two years.

Recently, Tafaauro applied for a loan to purchase vegetable seeds, chemicals, a wheelbarrow, a water tank, a rake, a shovel, hand gloves, and safety boots to help manage her business. She aims to use her profits to expand her business soon.

Tafaauro joined SPBD in 2024.
loan.whySpecial: It provides women with credit in a country where alternative financing is extremely scarce.
